name: Warriors Defender
description:
[Warriors Defender] the highly popular game of 2020, created the brand-new strategy card gameplay, coupled with blood boiling and fast-paced battles, making your game experience refreshing and exciting! Characters with unique abilities have all debuted, it's time to customize a unique and personalized lineup. More exciting welfare events are on the way to help you grow quickly! This is a story about how to become the strongest warrior. Hurry up and join with us, let's chase the dream of becoming the strong together!

 

[Game Introduction]

It is about the protagonist went to another world through the cracks of time and space, where he ascended on the throne of the Kingdom of Wind with his strong will and determination. However, on the second day of becoming the king, demons launched attack on the kingdom. Mysterious men from the superpowers including Demon Legion, Mara, and Divinedom appeared one after another. Amid crises, how do you, the protagonist, lead the Kingdom of Wind to rise again and unify the alien world!

 

Come and experience the theater-level gorgeous skills and enjoy the most incisive and exciting battle!

Here you can write the history of fantasy adventure legends on your own.

[Game Features]
◆Partner Transformation
Follow! Transform! Growing up! Summon your favorite goddess, every meeting is a continuation of warmth; guard your partners, adventure with them, and transform into them, making every second exciting and heart beating fast.

◆Fight for artifacts, cross-server arena
Team up! Loot treasures! Crush the boss! All these events are what you can have fun from. The cross-server conquest will be opening, and elites from all servers will gather to fight for the title of the World's Best Kingdom. As players upgrade and the country's territory expands, players will ally with each other to form alliances, and competition will become increasingly fierce. Your partners will follow you to fight and protect your homeland!

◆Exclusive gear increases your combat power
The tactics and strategies are ever-changing, by the optimal combination of all kinds of partners, you can easily clear all stages!
Gear can be advanced to activate the special effect, and the combination of gear is of super fun.

◆Strong partners with buffs
Those fantastic partners were born in the extreme land, you need to reach a certain stage before unlocking the feature and looking for your own exclusive partners
Each partner has an exclusive skill, which has a full-screen special effect when cast, the faster you obtain it, the more pleasure you will enjoy
